description:
T1 Oak (Quercus robur)-Crown Reduction reduce height by up to (2-3m) and lateral spread on all sides by up to (2.5-3m), to finished crown

T2 Apple (Malus sp) Crown Reduction reduce height by up to (2m) and lateral spread on all sides by up to (1m), to finished crown

T3- Yew (Taxus baccata) Cut Back Prune back to boundary fence line by removing approximately 2-3m back to suitable branch/fork junction

G1 Hedge reduce- Reduce height by approximately 3-4m (inline with height of ground floor of window) and trim
remaining by 0.5m hard back as possible without losing green foliage cover

 T4 Crown Reduction reduce height by up to (1-2m) and lateral spread on all sides by up to (1-2m), back to suitable
branch/fork junction
application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
